title: In vivo three-photon microscopy of subcortical structures within an intact mouse brain
title_cn: 完整小鼠大脑皮层下结构的体内三光子显微镜检查
abstract: Two-photon fluorescence microscopy enables scientists in various fields including neuroscience, embryology and oncology to visualize in vivo and ex vivo tissue morphology and physiology at a cellular level deep within scattering tissue. However, tissue scattering limits the maximum imaging depth of two-photon fluorescence microscopy to the cortical layer within mouse brain, and imaging subcortical structures currently requires the removal of overlying brain tissue or the insertion of optical probes. Here, we demonstrate non-invasive, high-resolution, in vivo imaging of subcortical structures within an intact mouse brain using three-photon fluorescence microscopy at a spectral excitation window of 1,700 nm. Vascular structures as well as red fluorescent protein-labelled neurons within the mouse hippocampus are imaged. The combination of the long excitation wavelength and the higher-order nonlinear excitation overcomes the limitations of two-photon fluorescence microscopy, enabling biological investigations to take place at a greater depth within tissue.
abstract_cn: 双光子荧光显微镜使神经科学，胚胎学和肿瘤学等各个领域的科学家能够在分散组织深处的细胞水平上可视化体内和离体组织的形态和生理学。但是，组织散射将双光子荧光显微镜的最大成像深度限制在小鼠大脑内的皮质层，而对皮质下结构进行成像目前需要去除上方的大脑组织或插入光学探针。在这里，我们展示了完整的小鼠大脑内皮层下结构的非侵入性高分辨率体内成像，使用三光子荧光显微镜在1,700nm的光谱激发窗口下进行。成像小鼠海马内的血管结构以及红色荧光蛋白标记的神经元。长激发波长和高阶非线性激发的结合克服了双光子荧光显微镜的局限性，使生物学研究可以在组织内进行得更深。

title: Detecting single infrared photons with 93% system efficiency
title_cn: 以93％的系统效率检测单个红外光子
abstract: Single-photon detectors at near-infrared wavelengths with high system detection efficiency (>90%), low dark count rate (<1 c.p.s.), low timing jitter (<100 ps) and short reset time (<100 ns) would enable landmark experiments in a variety of fields. Although some of the existing approaches to single-photon detection fulfil one or two of the above specifications, to date, no detector has met all of the specifications simultaneously. Here, we report on a fibre-coupled single-photon detection system that uses superconducting nanowire single-photon detectors and closely approaches the ideal performance of single-photon detectors. Our detector system has a system detection efficiency (including optical coupling losses) greater than 90% in the wavelength range λ = 1,520–1,610 nm, with a device dark count rate (measured with the device shielded from any background radiation) of ∼1 c.p.s., timing jitter of ∼150 ps full-width at half-maximum (FWHM) and reset time of 40 ns.

title: Achieving few-femtosecond time-sorting at hard X-ray free-electron lasers
title_cn: 在硬X射线自由电子激光器上实现几飞秒的时间排序
abstract: Recently, few-femtosecond pulses have become available at hard X-ray free-electron lasers. Coupled with the available sub-10 fs optical pulses, investigations into few-femtosecond dynamics are not far off. However, achieving sufficient synchronization between optical lasers and X-ray pulses continues to be challenging. We report a ‘measure-and-sort’ approach, which achieves sub-10 fs root-mean-squared (r.m.s.) error measurement at hard X-ray FELs, far beyond the 100–200 fs r.m.s. jitter limitations. This timing diagnostic, now routinely available at the Linac Coherent Light Source (LCLS), is based on ultrafast free-carrier generation in optically transparent materials. Correlation between two independent measurements enables unambiguous demonstration of ∼6 fs r.m.s. error in reporting the optical/X-ray delay, with single shot error suggesting the possibility of reaching few-femtosecond resolution.

title: Quantum-state transfer from an ion to a photon
title_cn: 从离子到光子的量子态转移
abstract: One model for quantum networks is based on the probabilistic measurement of two photons, each entangled with a distant node, such as an atom or atomic ensemble. A second, deterministic model transfers information directly from an atom onto a cavity photon, which carries it to a second node, as recently demonstrated with neutral atoms. In both cases, the challenge is to transfer information efficiently while preserving coherence. Here, following the second scheme, we map the quantum state of an ion onto a photon within an optical cavity. Using an ion enables deterministic state initialization, while the cavity provides coherent coupling to a well-defined output mode. Although it is often assumed that a cavity-based quantum interface requires the strong coupling regime, we show transfer fidelities of 92% in the presence of non-negligible decoherence and characterize the interplay between fidelity and efficiency. Our time-independent mapping process offers a promising route towards ion-based quantum networks.
abstract_cn: 一种用于量子网络的模型基于两个光子的概率测量，每个光子都与一个遥远的节点（例如原子或原子团）纠缠在一起。第二个确定性模型将信息直接从原子转移到腔体光子上，然后将其携带到第二个节点，如最近用中性原子所证明的。在这两种情况下，挑战都是要在保持一致性的同时有效地传递信息。在这里，按照第二种方案，我们将离子的量子态映射到光学腔内的光子上。使用离子可进行确定性的状态初始化，而空腔可将相干耦合提供给定义良好的输出模式。尽管通常认为基于腔的量子接口需要强耦合机制，但在存在不可忽略的退相干的情况下，我们显示出92％的传输保真度，并表征了保真度与效率之间的相互作用。我们与时间无关的映射过程为通往基于离子的量子网络提供了一条有希望的途径。

title: Calculating unknown eigenvalues with a quantum algorithm
title_cn: 用量子算法计算未知特征值
abstract: A quantum algorithm solves computational tasks using fewer physical resources than the best-known classical algorithm. Of most interest are those for which an exponential reduction is achieved. The key example is the phase estimation algorithm, which provides the quantum speedup in Shor's factoring algorithm and quantum simulation algorithms. To date, fully quantum experiments of this type have demonstrated only the read-out stage of quantum algorithms, but not the steps in which input data is read in and processed to calculate the final quantum state. Indeed, knowing the answer beforehand was essential. We present a photonic demonstration of a full quantum algorithm—the iterative phase estimation algorithm (IPEA)—without knowing the answer in advance. This result suggests practical applications of the phase estimation algorithm, including quantum simulations and quantum metrology in the near term, and factoring in the long term.
abstract_cn: 与最著名的经典算法相比，量子算法使用更少的物理资源来解决计算任务。 最令人感兴趣的是那些能够实现指数减少的产品。 关键示例是相位估计算法，该算法在Shor的因式分解算法和量子模拟算法中提供了量子加速。 迄今为止，这种类型的完全量子实验仅证明了量子算法的读出阶段，而没有证明输入数据被读取和处理以计算最终量子态的步骤。 确实，事先知道答案是至关重要的。 我们在不事先知道答案的情况下，对全量子算法＆＃8212;迭代相位估计算法（IPEA）＆＃8212;进行了光子演示。 该结果表明了相位估计算法的实际应用，包括近期的量子模拟和量子计量以及长期的因子分解。

title: Biological measurement beyond the quantum limit
title_cn: 超出量子极限的生物测量
abstract: Dynamic biological measurements require low light levels to avoid damaging the specimen. With this constraint on optical power, quantum noise fundamentally limits the measurement sensitivity. This limit can only be surpassed by extracting more information per photon by using quantum correlations. Here, we experimentally demonstrate that the quantum shot noise limit can be overcome for measurements of living systems. Quantum-correlated light with amplitude noise squeezed 75% below the vacuum level is used to perform microrheology experiments within Saccharomyces cerevisiae yeast cells. Naturally occurring lipid granules are tracked in real time as they diffuse through the cytoplasm, and the quantum noise limit is surpassed by 42%. The laser-based microparticle tracking technique used is compatible with non-classical light and is immune to low-frequency noise, leading the way to achieving a broad range of quantum-enhanced measurements in biology.
abstract_cn: 动态生物学测量需要弱光，以免损坏样本。 由于光功率的这种限制，量子噪声从根本上限制了测量灵敏度。 只有通过使用量子相关性为每个光子提取更多信息，才能超过此限制。 在这里，我们通过实验证明，对于生命系统的测量，可以克服量子散粒噪声限制。 振幅相关噪声压缩到低于真空水平75％的与量子相关的光用于在酿酒酵母酵母细胞内进行微流变学实验。 天然存在的脂质颗粒在细胞质中扩散时被实时跟踪，量子噪声极限超过42％。 所使用的基于激光的微粒跟踪技术可与非经典光兼容，并且不受低频噪声的影响，从而为实现生物学中广泛的量子增强测量方法提供了途径。

title: Frequency-upconverted stimulated emission by simultaneous five-photon absorption
title_cn: 通过五光子吸收同时进行频率转换的受激发射
abstract: Since the invention of the laser in 1960, multiphoton effects have become useful in techniques for real applications as well as conceptual predictions. Here, we report the first experimental observation of frequency-upconverted stimulated emission from a novel fluorophore through simultaneous five-photon absorption. Compared to lower-order nonlinear absorption, the fifth-order dependence on input light intensity of the five-photon absorption process will provide much stronger spatial confinement, allowing the achievement of a much higher contrast in imaging. Stimulated emission has also been achieved by the absorption of two to four photons under near-infrared laser excitation, making this gain medium a promising multiphoton imaging probe with attractive features, including the absence of autofluorescence from biological samples, large penetration depth, and improved sensitivity and resolution.
abstract_cn: 自1960年激光器发明以来，多光子效应已在实际应用技术和概念预测中变得有用。 在这里，我们报告从新型荧光团通过同时五光子吸收的频率上转换的受激发射的第一个实验观察。 与低阶非线性吸收相比，五光子吸收过程对输入光强度的五阶依赖性将提供更强的空间限制，从而在成像中实现更高的对比度。 还可以通过在近红外激光激发下吸收2至4个光子来实现受激发射，从而使这种增益介质成为具有前景的多光子成像探针，其具有吸引人的功能，包括没有生物样品的自发荧光，较大的穿透深度和更高的灵敏度。 和分辨率。

title: Efficient colour splitters for high-pixel-density image sensors
title_cn: 适用于高像素密度图像传感器的高效分色器
abstract: When the pixel size of image sensors shrinks to the wavelength of light, this results in low signal levels for a given photon flux per pixel as a result of scaling laws. Because many image sensors require colour filters, it becomes crucial for small-pixel sensors to have an efficient filtering method that can capture all incident photons without absorbing them. Here, we propose a new method to split colours by using a microscale plate-like structure with a transparent medium that has a higher refractive index than the surrounding material. We experimentally demonstrate that this principle of colour splitting based on near-field deflection can generate colour images with minimal signal loss. From comparisons of the sum of the total integrated values for the colour channels, we confirm the amount of light received is 1.85 times that of the conventional colour filter method of the Bayer array, while maintaining the same level of resolution.
abstract_cn: 当图像传感器的像素大小缩小到光的波长时，由于缩放定律，对于给定的每个像素光子通量，这将导致信号电平较低。 由于许多图像传感器都需要滤色镜，因此对于小像素传感器而言，拥有一种能够捕获所有入射光子而不吸收它们的有效滤波方法变得至关重要。 在这里，我们提出了一种新方法，该方法通过使用具有透明介质的微尺度板状结构来分离颜色，该透明介质的折射率比周围材料的折射率高。 我们实验证明基于近场偏转的分色原理可以生成具有最小信号损失的彩色图像。 通过比较颜色通道的总积分值之和，我们可以确定接收到的光量是传统拜耳阵列滤色器方法的1.85倍，同时保持相同的分辨率。

title: Wide-field optical detection of nanoparticles using on-chip microscopy and self-assembled nanolenses
title_cn: 使用片上显微镜和自组装纳米透镜的纳米颗粒的广域光学检测
abstract: The direct observation of nanoscale objects is a challenging task for optical microscopy because the scattering from an individual nanoparticle is typically weak at optical wavelengths. Electron microscopy therefore remains one of the gold standard visualization methods for nanoparticles, despite its high cost, limited throughput and restricted field-of-view. Here, we describe a high-throughput, on-chip detection scheme that uses biocompatible wetting films to self-assemble aspheric liquid nanolenses around individual nanoparticles to enhance the contrast between the scattered and background light. We model the effect of the nanolens as a spatial phase mask centred on the particle and show that the holographic diffraction pattern of this effective phase mask allows detection of sub-100 nm particles across a large field-of-view of >20 mm2. As a proof-of-concept demonstration, we report on-chip detection of individual polystyrene nanoparticles, adenoviruses and influenza A (H1N1) viral particles.
abstract_cn: 对于光学显微镜，直接观察纳米尺度的物体是一项艰巨的任务，因为单个纳米粒子的散射通常在光学波长下较弱。因此，电子显微镜尽管成本高，通量有限且视野受限，但仍是纳米颗粒的金标准可视化方法之一。在这里，我们描述了一种高通量，芯片上检测方案，该方案使用生物相容性润湿膜在各个纳米颗粒周围自组装非球面液体纳米透镜，以增强散射光与背景光之间的对比度。我们将纳米透镜的效果建模为以粒子为中心的空间相位掩模，并显示出这种有效相位掩模的全息衍射图样允许在大于1200的大视场内检测到100纳米以下的粒子。 20＆＃160; mm <sup> 2 </ sup>。作为概念证明，我们报告了对单个聚苯乙烯纳米颗粒，腺病毒和甲型流感病毒（H1N1）病毒颗粒的芯片检测。</ p>
